mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Deep in the Heart of Texas", "Bonaparte's Quadrille", "The Maverick", and "Phillupspace". ROUND DANCES "Waltz Time", and "Country Two-Step". SPECIAL FEATURES "Convention Time in Texas (Program)", "Home Is Where You Square Dance", "Structure for Square Dancing", "Square Dance Chain Letter", "Badges Travel Throughout World", and "Asilomar - June 1954". REGULAR FEATURES "As I See It", "The Square Dance Picture", "Square of the Month", "Women on the Square (Fashion Feature)", "'Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor", "On the Record", and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
